1111.title: Age Regression/Progression

11113.content:
It was a typical day for Maggie, the Simpson baby. Homer was at work, Bart and Lisa were at school, and she was sitting downstairs watching the Itchy-N-Scratchy show. Marge was on the couch knitting a new blue baggie for her.


"Itchy-N-Scratchy Show!!!!" The TV pronounced.


Maggie clapped her hands and Marge smiled.

Her smile disappeared as Maggie ripped a huge fart, but nothing else.

Marge was all business. She picked up Maggie and brought her to the bathroom. She removed her Baggie and pulled her Pull-up down. Marge then sat Maggie on the potty. Maggie sat there and looked blankly at her mother.

"WTH is she doing?!" Maggie thought.

Maggie has always been in diapers, for as long as she could remember, and she had no idea what her mother was doing to her now. Maggie is Mentally convinced that this was her life. Someone gave her a diaper, she used it, then they changed it for her. And at this day and age, she didn't plan on changing it. To her, this was how people lived. She always wondered why nobody else but her friendly babies did. She always saw her parents and siblings on this giant piece of metal. But she never knew why.

After a while Marge sighed. "What am I going to do with you Maggie? Your at the age where you need to be potty trained, I just can't figure out why you won't go. I always take you when I think you need to go," Marge explained as she pulled Maggie's pull up on, "But you never go, then as soon as I put your pull-up back on you mess them."

Maggie then farted again. Marge's eyes widened. This was a bigger and longer fart then usual. And like a mother always knows, the longer and stronger they are, the more they go. Maggie looked up at Marge and squinted. She farted even louder and longer and then her eyes widened and then squinted seriously hard again. Marge's heart sank as she heard Maggie fill up her diaper."

A few minutes later...
11113.title: Mental

111131.content:
Maggie was now squinting so hard she was looking like she was trying to keep her eyes open. She was standing up so Marge could see how her diaper was filling. Giant lumps were appearing all over her diaper. Marge hadn't done this in a while, but she grabbed the back of Maggie's diaper so she could feel her daughter messing. It was a test to make sure she soiled properly and wasn't having problems. Marge could feel as one after another, a giant bulge of poop hit the diaper. The diaper was squishy. Then it started expanding. Expanding like crazy. Marge let go and Maggie's diaper expanded and expanded and expanded, now 3 times the regular size. Maggie then stopped squinting. Marge covered her heart, and her nose, and walked over to Maggie to pick her up. But it wasn't over yet. Maggie looked at Marge as she sat down beside her. Maggie's tummy rumbled. Marge barely heard it. But she put her ear closer to Maggie's stomach.


rumble.....rumblerumblerumble...

"Probably some aftermath gas," Marge thought.

Rumble...rumblerumblerumblerumblerumble...

The rumbling started getting louder.

RUMBLE...RUMBLERUMBLERUMBLERUMBLERUMBLE....RRRUUUUUUUUMMMMMMMMBBBBBBBLLLL LLEEEEEE

Marge stepped back.

Just in time. Maggie cut a HUUUUGE fart and squinted extremely hard.

Then, it happened.

Marge watched in horror as her little daughter pooped a huge one.

It fell and hit like a bombshell in her diaper. Her diaper sagged and showed a gigantic bulge.


Whats next?
111131.title: Maggie keeps filling her diaper

1111312.content:
Marge was about to pick up Maggie when she heard a tinkle noise.

Marge looked at Maggie to find her standing up, swaying, with her eyes closed in pleasure.

Marge sighed in disappointment as she found out Maggie was peeing herself.

A few weeks back, Maggie's diaper designer came out with a new type of diaper. It was super absorbent and had a thing on the front that turned a pee-ish yellow green color when Maggie peed in it. The amount that showed up on the front compared to how much the user had peed in it. Marge had seen it fill up but never this fast. It usually took 5 minutes of solid peeing for it to reach the top. It only took one minute this time. Marge watched in amazement on how Maggie's diaper-which is already sagging from the poop- sag lower, past her ankles and turn a brownish-yellowish-greenish color.


Finally, Maggie stopped. She was tired from all the forcing. She fell back and sat in her own waste. Smiling warmly at her mother.


"I guess I deserve that after a week of no activity."


Afterwards...

111131222.content: "Kids, come with me," Marge ushered her three outside. "You're going to help me with Maggie." Bart's and Lisa's voices were distorted from holding their noses. Lisa added. "Well, Lisa, I thought that since you and Maggie are girls, she might learn by watching you." "You want LIsa to pee and poop in front of Maggie? That's kinda disgusting, even by my standards!" grimaced Bart. "Well, it's just that I'm at the end of my rope. We've tried Elmo, the Happy Little Elves, and Everybody Poops, and nothing has gotten through to her." Did you try Krusty's methodology?" Bart offered. Marge asked. "Yes, Mom," Bart and Lisa both replied. They ran warm water in Maggie's splashing pool and the kids helped Marge to give Maggie an outdoor bath. "Isn't this the same pool we used to bathe Santa's Little Helper in when he got sprayed by a skunk?" the kids asked. 11213.content: One morning, Lisa awoke in much the same way she usually did. But this morning was special. It was a Saturday in the summer, and she was going to indulge in a favorite pasttime: Reading. Lisa never tired of learning, even when it wasn't required of her. So after her pancake breakfast, she rode her bike to the Springfield Public Library. Nothing seemed amiss on her way there, but she had plenty to tell her mother when she arrived home later that afternoon. "It was the most amazing thing! Every book I picked up, it spoke to me! It was like I already knew what had been written on every page!" Lisa exclaimed. "There was just one thing wrong." "And what was that, dear?" her mother inquired. Lisa looked down toward the floor, and pointed at her soggy socks and squeaking sandals. "I wet and pooped myself," Lisa declared. "Everytime I started to read another book, it happened. I didn't feel it coming on until my panties were soaked and stinky." Marge didn't know what to make of Lisa's story. Was she being honest about her accident?

13123.content:
Hey; my name is Ty Turner. I'm exactly five foot with longish brown hair and brown eyes. I had the most interesting summer that was literally out of this world. It began with a very simple but very embarrassing misunderstanding between me and a giantess alien.

I was skinny dipping with my girlfriend when a huge, and I mean huge spaceship came down from the night sky and hovered over the lake we were swimming in. My girlfriend panicked and dived under water where I found myself looking at the spaceship with a sense of morbid curiosity. The ship opened and a beautiful, towering girl stepped out off a small ladder and came into the water with me. She looked like any other girl from Earth but I felt like a small infant compared to her size as she looked down at me. "What do we have here?" softly, she asked. she made a surprised expression. "A baby?"

I wanted to respond but the sigh of the giant girl had left me speechless as she gently took me into her arms and began to cradle me. "Where is your mom and dad, little one?"

Again, I wanted to respond but I was still in shock so all that came out sounded like pure baby babble, causing the girl to look at me with a certain affection. "Well, don't you worry." cooing me, she said. "Your new mommy is here and I will take much better care of you."

With that, she carried me back into the spaceship with me still unable to find my voice as the giantess girl took me to what appeared to have been a small bed room. Smiling at me, she took a blouse from a drawer and tightly wrapped it around my waist and legs like a makeshift cloth diaper. "That will have to do until I get you home, little one." smiling, she said. "Now, you stay on the bed where its safe while mommy tells the pilot to take us home."

It was then that it hit me. I was about to be abducted by an alien girl who thought I was an abandoned baby! I began to cry, wanting to tell her to let me go but no sooner I could form the first syllable, a large pacifier was shoved into my mouth, silencing me. I tried to spit it out but the girl had secured a string around my neck, preventing it. "You just suck on that until I can feed you, little one." giggling, she said.

With that, she walked away. Soon after, I felt the room shake. We were leaving Earth behind. I sat there, crying against the pacifier for what seemed like several minutes before the girl returned with....
13123.title: The alien thought I was a baby!

"What is this about you finding a baby, dear?" Concerned another voice asked.

I looked up, tears in my eyes to find an older woman entering with the girl who had abducted me. She looked down upon me then turned back to the girl. "Was it alone?" Whispering, she demanded.

The girl nodded. "The poor things was struggling to tread water when I found it in the lake I went to for a quick swim to cool off."

The woman sighed. "Are you certain the child was alone?" Firmly, she asked.

Again, the girl nodded. "I am certain, mother." Calmly, she replied. "This child was completely alone and I fear the poor thing was abandoned."

The woman shook her head, letting out another sigh. "You may keep it then." Softly, she said. "Do we have a boy or a girl to take care of?"

15332.content:
You knocked lightly on the door and a woman appeared a moment later.
"Oh, I'm so glad you made it," she informed, opening the door and letting you in, "I'm sorry I look like a complete mess, I should be leaving now but I still need a shower and to freshen up." She was interrupted by a young boy walking up to her, he was probably seven years old with bright blond hair wearing a digimon shirt and brown shorts.
"Mommy," he whined, "I went pee pee." The woman sighed and turned to him.
"Ok, let's get you cleaned up," she informed, she moved to pick the boy up but you intercepted and lifted the boy and placed him by your side.
"Don't worry Mrs Thomas, I'll get him cleaned," you informed, "you should go take a shower."
"You're an angel," she sighed before running off to the bathroom. You look at the seven year old in your arm.
"So, what's your name?" you asked.
"Henry," he replied with his fingers in his mouth.
"Well Henry, we should get you dry," you coo, "where is your room?"
"Over there," he informed, pointing down the hall, you follow his direction and enter a breath-taking room, it was designed to look like the moon, the ceiling was littered with little reflective circles that sparkled like stars, the walls were painted a dark blue colour and there were several worlds emerging from the walls and roof, it was absolutely amazing. There were two beds on either side of the room that looked like space shuttles and in the middle was a wardrobe that was large enough to use as a changing table. You placed Henry down on the table and pulled off his pants, revealing a soaked pull-up.
"My pull-ups are in the second draw," Henry informed as you wiped his privates clean. You pulled out the second draw and saw two stakes of pull-ups, one was jungle themed and one was digimon. You opted to go with the digimon, a choice henry seemed to like, and slipped it on him. You pick him up and place him on the ground.

"Ok kids, please be nice," the woman addressed as she stood by the door, she kissed each of them on the forehead before looked at you. "Thank you again for doing this."
"It's ok, I'm sure we'll have the best two weeks of our lives," you smiled. The woman smiled in return and turned to her children once again.
"Now, I have given permission to spank any of your who misbehave so be on your best behaviour," the woman warned, the four kids nodded. She left for the cab, waving goodbye. You turn to the kids, the youngest was probably only two or three, he had orange hair and bright green eyes, he wore a plain blue onesie, the next one up was Henry, after him was a ten-year-old who also had blond hair, he had bright blue eyes like Henry and wore a batman shirt. The oldest was in his early teens, probably thirteen, he had pitch-black hair and wore jeans accompanied by a white undershirt and a jacket with the logo of Kyuubi-Doo on the pouch.
"So, we should probably start with you names," you smiled.
"Well you already know me!" Henry cheered.
"Indeed I do," you smiled back.
"I'm Rex," the oldest informed, "that's Griffin and Tommy," he pointed to the ten year old and then to the youngest. "Why don't you three go and play." Rex told the others, they all left before Rex led you into the kitchen.
"I guess I should warn you," Rex started, you sat down at the table, "there's a sort of toilet issue in our house."
"I changed Henry's pull-up earlier," you inform nodding.
"That's not all," Rex replied, "Tommy and Griffin are both diapered full time."
"Ok, I guess I'll have my share of diapers to change then," you smiled.
"You aren't weirded out by the fact a ten-year-old is still diapered?" Rex asked, taken aback slightly.
"Not really," you replied casually, "I've babysat for loads of kids, you'd be surprised how many kids aren't potty-trained by the age of ten." Rex smiled, he was going to interrogate you, make sure you were the best, since his brothers deserved the best, but you seemed good. "Out of curiosity, do you ever change your brothers' diapers?"
"Whenever mum is busy," Rex replied, "I can help you for the next few weeks if you want."
"Don't worry, I'm being paid to take care of you all remember, all you have to do is relax, if any of your brothers come to you for a change just tell them to find me," you tell him.
"Ok, I will," Rex nodded.

You sat on the couch and watched Tommy playing with his blocks, the TV was showing some really young kid show that you found so childish it was incomprehensible. As you were watching Tommy you felt someone tap on your arm, you turn to see Griffin holding onto his crotch.
15332.title: Meet The Thomas'

choices: Griffin wakes you wanting a diaper change
You wake up the next morning
153322.content:
The boy was quite obviously upset, he was holding the front of his pants with tears in his eyes, you looked over to Tommy, who was happily playing with his toys. You stood up and kneeled in front of Griffin, you could understand why his was on the verge of tears, you could imagine how embarrassing it must be to admit to a complete stranger that you used your diaper at that age.
"What's wrong Griffin?" you asked.
"I peed," he admitted, a tear running down his face.
"Are you wearing your diaper?" you ask, Griffin nodded his head slowly. "Well there's no issue, diapers are made to go pee and poo in." Griffin wiped the tear from his face and smiled, he was sure you were going to make fun of him or scold him for using a diaper. You grab his hand and lead him into the space room, that he shared with Henry. You hoisted him up onto the wardrobe and pulled his pants off before un-taping his diaper. You did find it odd that he was still diapered while his younger brother was in pull-ups, but there could be a lot of reasons behind that and you didn't want to ask Griffin about it in case it was a sensitive subject, you would probably ask Rex about it later. You cleaned Griffin before powdering him and slipping a new diaper under him. After all the years you had spent babysitting you had gotten quite good at changing diapers. Once you were finished you helped Griffin down and gave him a playful pat on the diaper.
"Thank you," he replied.
"It was my pleasure," you smiled. The rest of the day went along smoothly, you were told by Rex that Tommy was to be in bed by six o'clock, Griffin and Henry's bedtime was eight and although Rex did say his bedtime was ten you allowed him to stay up as long as he wanted.

At four you cooked dinner and everyone ate happily, when they were finished you quickly changed Tommy's diaper and bathed him before tucking him into bed, as you were the other three were in the lounge watching TV. Once you were finished you entered the room and sat next to Rex on the lounge, Henry was on the floor while Griffin was on the couch chair, they were watching one of the Kyuubi-Doo movies.
"This is old," you laughed as you sat down, "this is from when I was really little."
"Yeah, I love Kyuubi-Doo," Rex admitted, "even if it is a kids movie."
"I always saw it as a family movie honestly," you replied, Rex smiled as you did. A lot of people made fun of him for liking a show for babies, telling him to grow up, even his friends thought it was childish. It was nice to have someone accept that he like it. About an hour into the movie you noticed Henry fidgeting a lot, he was drumming his feet on the ground and was holding his crotch. "Are you ok Henry?" you asked, Henry didn't seem to notice his fidgeting until you called his name, he stood up and turned to you, one hand covering his crotch and the other on his butt.
"I need to go potty," he informed.
"Well then let's go," you picked him up and carried him over to the bathroom, a red plastic potty sat next to the toilet, you helped Henry get his pants and pull-up down before watching as he sat down and released his pee and poo into the potty.
"Good job," you praised as he wiped himself and stood up, you helped him put his pull-up and pants back on before emptying out of potty. You took his hand and led him back to the lounge to finish the movie. When the movie was finished you carried a sleeping Henry in your arm with the other holding onto the hand of Griffin, you placed Henry on his bed and tucked him in before changing Griffin's diaper and tucking him into bed as well.

"So, how was the first day of babysitting us?" Rex asked as you entered the room.
"You're nice kids," you replied with a smile. "I'm wondering about Griffin..."
"Why he's still in a diaper when Henry's in a pull-up?" Rex asked, cocking an eyebrow.
"Yeah, is it a medical issue?" you asked, Rex nodded his head.
"Griffin was diagnosed with a mild case of Spina Bifida," Rex explained, "so he can't control his ability to use the toilet." You nodded in understanding, it must be hard for him. "Have you settled into your room yet?"
"No, I should probably do that now," you replied, getting up and walking off to your room, you put your clothes into the draws and changed into your pyjamas, you had a good first day with the kids, and you had a whole two weeks more of it. You slipped into bed and drifted off to sleep.

Your mother shrinks Ashely down to the same size you are,

Your mother smiles in contentment. “Much better. Now I do believe we emerge discussing your new rules.” She said putting her hands in her hips looking down at the two baby sized young adults.

“First and foremost... You shall only address me as Momma or Mommy. Ever since you called me Mom, you’ve had a really bad attitude towards me (your name here). The same goes for you Ashley, if you call me anything else, Momma will get her belt out, and she’ll straighten you both out. Understand?”

You both gulp as you look up at your gargantuan mother in fear. Reminded of the days back when she seemed this big and terrifying to you. “Y-yes Momma...” you both answer in unison.

“Everytime Mommy gives you an order, or asks you a question, all answers should respectfully end with Mommy or Momma. If Momma ever hears so much as hears a Yeah, or a Okay, or Fine, you will meet SERIOUS consequences. Got it?” She asked, stomping her large bare foot in the ground.

The ground shook beneath you both a bit. You both shake in fear, and answer her promptly, “Yes Momma...”

“Very good! Also, you will no longer need thes dreadful cell phones.” She says snapping the flip phones in half and throwing them in the trash can. Ashely chirped in anguish over her destroyed cellphone. She lived that device more than anything. “Babies have no such need as cellphones. They play with toys and suck on binkies. All of their attention is supposed to be on they’re wonderful big Mommy, not SnapChat.”

“While you will adopt the lifestyle of normal babies, you will be disciplined as if you were small children in a strict household. The slightest attitude or talk-back will have you end up over Mommy’s knee. Mommy controls what you eat, what you wear, where you sleep, and what you do in your spare time. I own you both now. Got it?”

You both quickly respond, “YES MOMMA!” Ashley begins to tear up, as she sees her life being snatched away by your giant bitchy mother.

“Ashley, go to Mommy’s diaper bag beside the couch and grab a diaper from it, and bring it back here.” She commanded pointing at the nearby bag slumped against the couch. Ashely didn’t hesitate to quickly pace over to the bag, but not before your mother bent down and smacked Ashley’s bare bottoms. Ashely hopped in pain as she quickly rummaged into your mothers bag, and handed her a diaper. Within seconds, your mother diapers Ashely like a pro. Your mother sets the gun ontop of the fireplace mantle beside your baby picture, and smiled.

“Look at you two... Momma loves you babies so much.” She cooed.

You both stare up at her in fear, not sure what to say, if your allowed to say anything at all. It didn’t take long before her expression grew cold and intimidating. “Your supposed to say you love me too...” she growled.

You stammer, trying to recover from that mistake. “W-We love you too Momma!!!”
“How nice to hear my babies say that. Momma hasn’t heard her baby boy tell his Momma that he lived her in many years. Now I’ll get to hear it anytime I want.” She giggled.

Moments passed by, and your mother managed to get you inside of blue footsie pajamas, and tied a frilly baby bonnet over your head. As for Ashley, your mother put her in one of Samantha’s old pink dress, a baby bonnet, and booties to match. Your mother has you both sitting next to each other on a couch. She puts her hands in her hind and smiles widely. “You two are so damn cute! There’s only one thing missing.” She pulls out two used pacifiers from Samantha’s playpen, and shoved one each into your mouths.

“Babies are to be seen, not heard.” She giggles to herself as she watches her two new babies nervously suck on their pacifiers.Ashley begins to cry softly, feeling absolutely helpless. You both know full an well that if you spit out your pacifier, there will be Hell to pay.

“I think it’s time that Momma...”
154131111.title: Laying Down The Law

Jason tries to respond but is interrupted by cindy the twin in green. "Mindy please, is that anyway to introduce the new kid." Cindy wraps an arm around jason. "Don't mind her, she reads weird books and i think its messed with her head." Suddenly Mindy placed her head on Jason's shoulder. "Listen here not so new kid, better watch out. Kenworth has a dark and mysterious past!" Cindy pushes Mindy back. "Cut it out!" Mindy jumps in front of Jason waving her hands as if she's making her own flashback effects. "Once long ago on a dark and stormy night a young girl was beckoned to the basement!" "Mindy!" Despite Cindy's interruptions Mindy continued. "Quiet you! i'm narrating, drawn down! into the deep dark of the basement" "What beckoned her?" Jason asked much to Cindy's displeasure. "Don't indulge her." Mindy pulls Jason in close to her face. "THE DEMON!!" it killed her, but left her soul in this very building!" "Mindy Alweather! Let go of that boy's face this instant!" Jason is released and turns to see Headmistress Kenworth and his father. Jason turns around and Mindy is gone, left only the sound of giggling as she runs up a spiral stair case. "i'll be in room 314 if you wanna talk later." Cindy told Jason before she ran off after Mindy.

15512.content:
You are Kimi, a bright young Asian girl, age 12, sent off to the prestigious Golden Sunflower School for Girls.

Golden Sunflower was an all-girl school for girls aged 12 to 18 (sixth through 12th grade). Many of its graduates had gone on to become CEO's, senators, famous musicians, doctors, and other extremely successful careers because of the connections they got with other students at Golden Sunflower. Kimi's mom and dad had been a little unsure about sending their daughter off to live at school at the young age of 12, but eventually decided that their little girl could handle it.

"Be good and get good grades! We love you!" Kimi's Dad said after he hugged his daughter goodbye.
Kimi watched as her Dad drove off. This would be the last time she'd see him for a while. She then turned to the school itself. It was a very large building, both in width and height. There were very few windows, and the dorms and classrooms were all in the same building. Kimi felt a little scared.
"Come on, Kimi. You can do this. Believe in yourself." Kimi whispered.

Kimi slowly walked up the path to the front door, carrying her suitcase. She had been told not to pack any clothes, since the school would provide uniforms that were to be worn at all times. She did bring some books and movies from home, though, as well as some pillows and a beanbag elephant named Sari that she talked to when she was feeling down.

Once Kimi got inside the school, her suitcase was taken by a worker to her dorm, and she was directed to meet with the other Sixth Graders in the nurse's station for a quick check-up. It seemed a little weird to Kimi, but she went with it.

There were several nurses at the Nurse Station. A tall blonde woman named Nurse Maria came out from inside one of the check-up rooms.
"I can take whoever's next!" She called out.
Kimi went forward.

"Ah, you're a real cutie. What's your name?" Nurse Maria asked.
"Kimi Long." Kimi said, sitting down on a table.
"All right, Kimi, I need you to take off your clothes. All of them." Nurse Maria said.
"Completely naked?" Kimi asked.
"Yep." Nurse Maria said.

Kimi stripped naked for the nurse. She felt weird being naked around a stranger, but figured all the girls had to do this. Nurse Maria smiled, seeing Kimi's flat chest and hairless crotch.
"Ah, that's good. Not much development." She said.
Kimi wrapped her arms around her flat chest, embarrassed. She hadn't been through much of puberty yet.
"No, no, that's a good thing here. Other wise we'd have to regress you, and that can be painful." Nurse Maria said.
"Regress?" Kimi said.
"Yeah, we want all our girls grades 6 to 9 like kids." Nurse Maria said.

This was really starting to weird Kimi out, but she just accepted it. All her classmates would be just as short, flat-chested, and undeveloped as she was.

Nurse Maria continued the examination. When she was finished, she got out a diaper with a yellow sunflower on the butt. Kimi's eyes went wide.
"What's that for?" She asked.
"It's the school uniform. Students wear only a regulation diaper while on school grounds." Nurse Maria said.
"What?!?" Kimi said.
"It's part of the rules. Students are forbidden form using toilets and wear diapers. That's how it is, that's how it's always been." Nurse Maria said.

Kimi was starting to wish her Mom and Dad had never sent her here. However, she knew that if she didn't go along with this, then she would have a hard time getting into a good college and make her parents proud. Reluctantly, Kimi let Nurse Maria diaper her.

Nurse Maria was quick and efficient. When she was done she gave Kimi a nice pat on her padded crotch.
"There you go, all done." Nurse Maria said.
Kimi wasn't too happy about this, but tried to hide it. Actually, no, she was mad that she would be diapered for the next 6 years of her life.
"Aw man." She thought to herself.

Kimi exited the Nurse Station and fund the hallway filled with dozens of other little girls just like her: confused, annoyed, and wearing nothing more than a diaper.

Kimi was handed a pamphlet during orientation. It boasted:
-Regression and puberty-delaying chemicals in the school lunches keep students as kids.
-Full-service diaper changing provided at all times at Nurse stations and in dorm commons
-Top quality education provided by world-class teachers
-Good behavior earns rewards

First, introductions. My name is Mark Stone, I'm thirteen years old. I have light brown hair that falls just short of my shoulders, blue eyes, and a small frame and slender frame. I fell ill as a toddler and never grew past three feet four inches tall, making me look more like a small toddler. I have a fifteen year old sister named Lyssa. She is average height for her age with light brown hair to her waist, brown eyes, and a body most girls would kill for. It annoyed me to see boys drooling at her but as three feet four inches, I was not exactly able to be the protective brother, it was the opposite way around. Lyssa always got mad when anyone picked on me due to my size and feminine features.

Mom and dad were loaded due to their technology research company. My sister and I really did not know what they did but it kept them overseas for months at a time. We were always given more than enough money to support ourselves so it was not much that we minded, we enjoyed the freedom and the trust they had in us. However, all that changed when I fell ill due something no one had seen before. Mom and dad were called by the doctors and they flew back home that evening and consulted the doctors before sitting us down at home to talk.

"Mark, you have what is called full body dysfunction disease." looking at me sadly, he said. "It's been dubbed the 'baby' disease and, although it is survivable, its very crippling."

To say I was terrified would have been an understatement. I knew the questions I wanted to ask but I could not form the words, something was making my lips and tongue feel numb. "Wha- da dis deses go?"

Mom sighed, tears falling. "Oh no..." weeping, she said. "It's starting already."

"What does this disease do?" frightened, Lyssa asked.

"Basically, it slowly 'short circuits' every system in the body, leaving the victim as helpless as a newborn baby." taking Lyssa's hand, dad replied. "Fortunately, it dies out once the body is 'short circuited' but poor Mark will have to relearn how to do everything."

"As the disease short circuits every system, his stomach will no longer be able to handle solid foods until it can regain its resistance to acids." tearfully, mom added. "Also, he'll tire easily until his heart and lungs regain their stamina."

"Hence, the reason it is called the 'baby' disease." looking at me, dad said. "I'm very sorry but, to make things easier on you, we have no choice but to treat you as an infant from the start until this disease runs its course."

My eyes widened like saucers, hearing that and I began to cry before I...

I saw all of my teeth, they had somehow come loose and flew out of my mouth when I threw up!

"Da-Da!" terrified, I stuttered. "My teat, my- my teat!"

"It's progressing faster than the doctors said it would." stunned, dad said. "This is dangerous."

"His body could go into shock." gently picking me up, dad replied. "We have to keep him calm." he then turned to me. "Easy now, Mark." cooing, he said. "They will grow back, you will get everything back, I promise you."

"I scared." crying, I said. "Hard to tak."

"Your tongue is going numb." calmly, dad explained. "The sudden loss of all your teeth does not help. We'll find other ways for you to communicate, okay?"

Reluctantly, I nodded but gave a startled yell as dad pushed a pacifier into my mouth. "Keep it in there." firmly, he said. "It will help calm you." sighing, he added, "Don't make me tie it into place, just trust me and suck on it."

info.brief_description: Come here to write about everything that includes Diapers!
info.description:
Come here to plan out stories. You are aloud to post any diaper stories you want but follow these rules:

Rules:
--Entries must be AL LEAST a paragraph long in length
--No swearing
--No insulting any religion
--No killing characters (only I can do that)
--No replacing characters (you can add new ones though)
--Keep in the age limit
--No drug use or reference


Fan fictions are not only allowed, they are encouraged, just as long as they stay in the limit (If you want to see a fan fiction of a program you like, but for some reason can not add, email me and I'll probably do it)

Also although physical age regression is allowed mental is preferred.

Also, although this may seem self explanatory, just to make it clear, don't go into to much detail with the info on each story, so that others can add things they want.

Also the info on the story has to be followed to the line, you can add new things in but whats written there must appear in the story somewhere (which is why I don't what you to go into to much detail about the story in the info)

Also it is a rule that all options blocks have to be used, unless in a situation that I deam okay, (if you can't think of another idea to put in the block just put 'Other' and the next person to post will just add what he/she wants), also as a linking rule for the first few pages that have five options can not be used, as such each story that leads to a page with five options will have the choice for the story you selected or another one of the four new ones. (See inside)

Also, just to clear things up, their are three classes of regression:
Physical
Mental
Forced

Physical means that the character or characters regress physically, there bodies become younger.
Mental means that the character or characters regress mentally, there minds become younger.
Forced means the the character or characters don't regress in any way, they are forced by someone or some people to act and/or dress like they are younger.

With that being said, go on! Have a good time!
